name: ACCOUNTING SOLUTIONS
des: Spend your time building your business and your profits; I will handle your bookkeeping, payroll, record keeping, report filing, and more

name: TAX PREPARATION
des: Hire a professional firm to handle your taxes. I provide professional and timely services.

name: FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
des: I can prepare or supervise the preparation of your financial statements. Then fully compiled and reviewed according to your needs.

name: BUSINESS SETUP
des: Ready to start your own business? Then you have come to the right place. I work personally with our clients to achieve their business goals.

name: PAYROLL PROCESSING
des: My Payroll Processing Services includes preparation of payroll checks as well as any agency checks necessary for employee garnishments, such as child support, bankruptcy, creditor garnishments, etc
